string.name: what_s_new_toast
string.font:
- üòç We've added new mini-player skins (Disk Dynamo, Elongated Beat, Misty Dream, Rotating Gradient, Skewed Dynamic and Wavy Dynamic Dots). 
 Please go to Personalize Screen to use these new skins. 
 - We've added new awesome animations to NowPlaying Screen. 
 - We've updated the UI of Artists, Genres, Folders screen. 
 - We've enhanced the functionality of the app. 
 - We've added a new Dynamic Widget that automatically adjusts to size.

item.font:
We've enhanced the functionality of the app. 
 We're utilizing the new, advanced NowPlaying API for real-time updates regarding playback metadata state. 
 We've added a new Dynamic Widget that automatically adjusts to size. 
 More App Widget styles are coming soon.
